items.name: Oasis Tales Corner
items.short_description: A serene park where traditional Mauritanian fables come alive through interactive storytelling sessions and beautifully crafted character statues. Children can listen to ancient desert legends under the shade of palm trees.

items.name: Sahara Story Circle
items.short_description: An open-air storytelling venue designed to immerse children in captivating narratives from around the world and local folklore. Features comfortable seating areas and a small stage for performances.
items.address: Avenue Gamal Abdel Nasser, Dar Naim, Nouakchott

items.name: Fisherman's Fables Park
items.short_description: Located near the coast, this park celebrates the stories of Nouakchott's fishermen and the Atlantic Ocean. Kids can explore themed play areas and listen to tales of sea adventures and mythical creatures.
items.address: Near Port de Pêche, El Mina, Nouakchott

items.name: Nomadic Narratives Garden
items.short_description: A tranquil garden space dedicated to the rich storytelling traditions of Mauritania's nomadic tribes. Children can engage with traditional objects, listen to songs, and hear stories of desert life and journeys.

items.name: Nouakchott Kids Kingdom
items.short_description: A vibrant theme park offering a variety of gentle rides, colorful attractions, and interactive zones for younger children. From mini roller coasters to soft play areas, there's fun for all.

items.name: Atlantic Funland Park
items.short_description: This seaside theme park boasts ocean-themed rides, a mini-train exploring a mock 'coastal village', and a variety of carnival games. Perfect for a day of excitement by the sea.
items.address: Plage de Nouakchott, El Mina, Nouakchott

items.name: Desert Discovery Park
items.short_description: An imaginative theme park designed to educate and entertain, with attractions showcasing desert ecosystems, animal encounters, and interactive exhibits about Mauritanian history and geography.

items.name: Sand Dune Adventureland
items.short_description: A unique adventure park featuring mini dune buggy rides, simulated desert treks, and obstacle courses designed for kids to explore and conquer. Thrills and active play await.

items.name: Junior Kicks Stadium
items.short_description: A dedicated mini-football arena with artificial turf and small goals, perfect for children's soccer leagues and casual games. Coaching sessions are also available for budding athletes.

items.name: Coastal Kids Hoops Court
items.short_description: An outdoor mini-basketball court designed for children, featuring adjustable hoops and soft playing surfaces. Ideal for practice, friendly matches, and developing basketball skills.

items.name: Unity Youth Sports Zone
items.short_description: A multi-sport complex offering mini-courts for tennis, volleyball, and futsal, tailored for children. Provides equipment rental and organized group activities.
items.address: Avenue de la Paix, Dar Naim, Nouakchott

items.name: Desert Track & Field Jr.
items.short_description: A compact sports facility with a mini running track, long jump pit, and areas for shot put practice, all scaled for young athletes. Encourages foundational athletic development.
items.address: Route de Rosso, Quartier Sebkha, Nouakchott

items.name: Atlantic Marine Life Center
items.short_description: Explore the rich biodiversity of the Atlantic Ocean in this educational aquarium. Features tanks with local fish species, touch pools, and interactive displays about marine conservation.

items.name: Sahara Seas Aquarium
items.short_description: A unique concept combining desert and sea, showcasing marine life found off the Mauritanian coast and telling the geological story of how the Sahara once bordered ancient seas.
items.address: Boulevard de l'Indépendance, Dar Naim, Nouakchott

items.name: Nouakchott Ocean Wonders
items.short_description: This family-friendly aquarium offers mesmerizing exhibits of colorful fish, graceful rays, and intriguing invertebrates. Daily feeding shows and guided tours enhance the experience.
items.address: Quartier Cité Plage, El Mina, Nouakchott

items.name: Coastal Creatures Exhibit
items.short_description: A smaller, intimate aquarium focusing on the fascinating creatures inhabiting the coastal waters and estuaries of Mauritania. Ideal for younger children to observe and learn.

items.name: Desert Dream Circus
items.short_description: A magical mini-circus featuring local and international performers, including acrobats, clowns, and animal acts (ethical, non-harmful animal performances like trained dogs or birds). A spectacle of wonder for all ages.

items.name: Nomad Puppet Playhouse
items.short_description: Experience traditional Mauritanian puppet shows and modern tales brought to life by skilled puppeteers. This intimate theater offers a unique cultural and entertaining experience.

items.name: Starry Night Circus Tent
items.short_description: An enchanting traveling circus that sets up its vibrant tent in different neighborhoods, offering a mix of clown acts, juggling, and mesmerizing aerial performances under the desert sky.
items.address: (Varies, check schedule) e.g., Quartier Ksar, Nouakchott

items.name: Oasis Marionette Show
items.short_description: A delightful marionette theater showcasing intricate handcrafted puppets telling classic stories and new adventures. Workshops are sometimes available for children to learn basic puppetry.

items.name: Nouakchott Soft Play Palace
items.short_description: A sprawling indoor play center with multi-level climbing structures, ball pits, slides, and tunnels, providing a safe and exciting environment for children of all ages to burn energy.

items.name: Kids Oasis Zone
items.short_description: This vibrant indoor play area features bounce houses, arcade games, and designated zones for toddlers. It's a perfect escape from the heat and a hub for active imagination.
items.address: Boulevard Cheikh Zayed, Dar Naim, Nouakchott

items.name: Adventure Dome Play
items.short_description: An expansive indoor facility offering climbing walls, obstacle courses, and adventure-themed play structures. Designed for older kids seeking more physical challenges and thrills.

items.name: Little Explorers Hub
items.short_description: A smaller, cozy indoor play space ideal for younger children, featuring sensory play areas, building blocks, and imaginative play zones. Focuses on developmental play in a calm environment.
items.address: Rue de la Mosquée Marocaine, Sebkha, Nouakchott

items.name: Nouakchott Aqua Fun Land
items.short_description: The city's premier water park for kids, featuring a range of slides, splash pads, and shallow pools with interactive water features. Supervised by lifeguards for safe family fun.
items.address: Boulevard de la Corniche, Tevragh-Zeina, Nouakchott

items.name: Desert Oasis Splash Park
items.short_description: A refreshing water park designed with a desert oasis theme, offering gentle slides, spray fountains, and a lazy river section perfect for younger children and relaxation.

items.name: Atlantic Waves Mini-Park
items.short_description: Located near the beach, this mini water park has small wave pools, a dedicated toddler splash zone, and mini water cannons for endless splashing excitement.

items.name: Sunny Shores Water Playground
items.short_description: A vibrant and colorful water play area with interactive elements like tipping buckets, sprinklers, and low-gradient slides, ensuring hours of cool fun for preschoolers.

items.name: Nouakchott Dino Safari
items.short_description: Step back in time to the age of dinosaurs in this immersive park featuring life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, fossil digging sites, and a guided safari tour.
items.address: Route de Rosso, Quartier Dar Naim, Nouakchott

items.name: Jurassic Sandscapes Park
items.short_description: A prehistoric adventure land set amidst sand dunes, where children can encounter realistic dinosaur replicas, participate in archaeology-themed games, and learn about ancient creatures.

items.name: Ancient Reptile Reserve
items.short_description: While not strictly a 'dinosaur park', this attraction focuses on ancient reptiles and their modern descendants, with a special section dedicated to smaller, interactive dinosaur exhibits and skeletal displays.

items.name: Dino Dig Adventure Zone
items.short_description: An interactive zone where kids can become paleontologists for a day, digging for 'fossils' in large sandpits, assembling dinosaur skeletons, and exploring a mini-museum of prehistoric finds.

items.name: Desert Toon Town
items.short_description: A lively attraction where children can meet and interact with their favorite cartoon characters inspired by desert animals and local folklore. Photo opportunities and mini-shows available.
items.address: Place de la Culture, Tevragh-Zeina, Nouakchott

items.name: Nouakchott Character Plaza
items.short_description: A spacious plaza hosting rotating appearances of popular international and local cartoon mascots. Kids can get autographs, take pictures, and enjoy themed activities.
items.address: Centre Commercial Souk, Dar Naim, Nouakchott

items.name: Magic Cartoon Corner
items.short_description: An indoor meet & greet spot specifically designed for younger children, with gentle character interactions, storytelling, and face painting inspired by beloved animated films.

items.name: Animation Heroes Hub
items.short_description: A dynamic venue where kids can high-five their favorite superhero and adventure cartoon characters. Features themed backdrops for photos and occasional mini-parades.
items.address: Avenue de la Mosquée, El Mina, Nouakchott

items.name: Nouakchott Mini Farm
items.short_description: A charming educational farm where children can meet and feed friendly farm animals like goats, chickens, and donkeys. Includes a small vegetable patch for learning about gardening.
items.address: Route de l'Espoir, PK 5, Arafat, Nouakchott

items.name: Desert Animal Encounter Farm
items.short_description: Focuses on animals adapted to the desert environment, such as camels, ostriches, and local goat breeds. Offers camel rides for kids and interactive feeding sessions.
items.address: Route de l'aéroport, Zone Rurale, Nouakchott

items.name: Oasis Petting Zoo & Garden
items.short_description: A lush green space housing a variety of small, gentle animals for children to interact with. Also features a sensory garden with aromatic plants and shaded picnic spots.

items.name: Agri-Kids Learning Farm
items.short_description: An interactive farm designed for learning about agriculture and food production. Children can participate in planting seeds, harvesting vegetables, and understanding sustainable farming practices.
items.address: Quartier Cité Plage, Dar Naim, Nouakchott
